articles.title: Hopes of sharp fall in household energy bills as HSBC cuts gas price forecast - The Guardian
articles.description: Bank slashes predicted 2023 European wholesale price by 30% as mild weather reduces demand
articles.content:
HSBC has slashed its forecasts for future wholesale gas prices in response to mild weather in Europe raising hopes of a sharp decline in household energy bills.
